import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const Login = () => { const [inputField, setInputField] = useState({ username: '', password: '' }) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleChange = (e) => { setInputField({ ...inputField, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handlelogin = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const username = inputField.username const password = inputField.password try { const admin = await axios.post('https://login-api.web2rise.in/api/login', { username, password }) const token = admin.data.token // console.log(token) if (token) { navigate('/Home') } localStorage.setItem('token', token) } catch (error) { console.log('error', error) } } return ( <> {/*
*/}
Return home

SIGN IN

LONYX

A UX BASED CREATIVE AGENCEY
) } export default Login
